Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim of a pale-red pottery bowl, with straight sides and everted rim, the fabric is pink in section, all the outer surface is covered with a red-slip and the exterior is elaborated with the remains of one line of incised Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394189) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394189)
